meanings.definition: To formally declare one's abandonment or rejection of something.
meanings.sent1: She renounced her membership in the club.
meanings.sent2: He renounced his claim to the throne.
meanings.sent3: The cat renounced its interest in the yarn and chased a butterfly instead.
meanings.sent4: The artist renounced traditional techniques and embraced a new style.
meanings.sent5: After the argument, she renounced all ties to her former friend.

meanings.definition: To give up or refuse to follow or adhere to something.
meanings.sent1: They renounced their unhealthy eating habits and started exercising regularly.
meanings.sent2: He renounced his bad habits and focused on self-improvement.
meanings.sent3: The student renounced studying for the exam and decided to go for a walk instead.
meanings.sent4: The athlete renounced his old training regimen and adopted a more effective one.
meanings.sent5: She renounced procrastination and began working on her project immediately.

meanings.sent1: The wealthy family renounced their rebellious son.
meanings.sent2: He renounced his criminal past and sought redemption.
meanings.sent3: The company renounced its failed product and focused on a new innovation.
meanings.sent4: The politician renounced his controversial statements and issued an apology.
meanings.sent5: She renounced her former beliefs and embraced a new ideology.
